channel.title: Speed runs
channel.description:
hello every one, so any speed runs as of yet? i did a speed run 30 mins ago, finished in 3:01:15(very bad time) but thats bcoz it is a first speed run and i f.. up on alot of places and not all shorcuts figured out. developer did a speed run in like 2:27:00 but he f.. up alot 2, but when iwatched him do the run, i did some improvments, it was harder for me also i didint rimember exat monster/soldiers spots.
if any one ask yes i finished the game on hard, nothing so hard if u use brains and are atleast experenced in this kind of fps(competitive back ground of my helps alot).
half-life 1 - speed run record 51:24 on hard(i know u can do alot alot faster record is 29 :s omthing but i always always f up on some places and stuff.)
so im here to ask any speed runs from u guys? share times.

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Is that supposed to cancel out everyone else’s speed runs or something?

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Here’s mine from UC to the Xen portal, 1:53:05. Link

Now you can see how terrible a shooter I am!

3 crashes, something like 5 deaths, 20 minutes of (cut out) loading screens. I gotta try it again sometime.

One of the devs made a speedrun, more or less 3h.

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Dr. Maxwell:

I’m sticking around these forums because I had high expectations for the game and I’m still kinda bummed that, rather than exceeding my maximum expectations, it failed to meet my minimum expectations.

Wait, you’re sticking around the forum to keep complaining until they change it to your like.
Sounds like someone needs to see the daylight.

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs

item.description:

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
One of the devs made a speedrun, more or less 3h.

There are also speedruns of tripmines puzzle.
My favorite one belongs to Dkv, he avoided completely the mines using a rocket-jump.

Off topic

Dr. Maxwell:

The game is terrible and nobody would want to speedrun it.

If you despise so much this game, what are you still doing here?
I guess you’re one of those lads that have fun trollin’ in forums.

It’s not the first time that you try to troll in these forums.

OFF!

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: Tinker
item.description:
Yep, its quite easy to make it in 2 hours or less.
Im trying to make my own speedrun too, looking for possible shortcuts and glitches. This game is full of both and i like it.

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Yeah, that is how the old Half-Life and Half-Life 2 speedruns managed to be so fast, you split the game up into sections and complete them as fast as possible

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: OnboardError
item.description:
if i did it segmented like my best time for each map and clipped it together at the end that would be easier. thats a good idea

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Sub 2-hours is easily possibly. At the moment I’m guessing around 1:20 for a very good (segmented) run, but I can tell you all that there is a team of us working on a run

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs

mine was with the tram ride

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
I did one in 2:44 (not including tram or loads)… not sure exactly what OBE counted, but that was just my 2nd time through. There was MUCH room for improvement. I started out really well but then became much slower during the second half. I started to forget things and get lost a bit. I still haven’t quite figured out the crazy maze that is Lambda Core. :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: karotiv
item.description:
OnboardError:

I hold the record so far.

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13796

IMO if i REALLY REALLY REALLY pushed i think i could get that to 2 hours.

yes i mentioned u in my thread, but u are dev whit lots of runs and yes i saw u live on twich doing this.
imo u could push less then 2h hours, i saw one spot where u could of saved time, i bet there are alot more shortcuts, and whit out your deaths, and stuff u showed insted of speeding, i bet u could do less then 2h. im gona try tomorow(have no time today, job) to beat my record im sure i will coz i failed hard on some parts, anyway good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Speed runs
item.dc:creator: idclip
item.description:
That’s what speedruns are about! Get a game that lasts ten hours and finish it in one, exploiting everything you can. I can’t wait to see a good speedrun of BM.
I’ll try one myself as I finish the first playthrough, TAS run, even if I’m not good enough to speedrun.

Read full topic
